price: Dájúdájú al-Ƙur’ān ni tírà ìrántí fún ìwọ àti ìjọ rẹ. Láìpẹ́ wọ́n máa bi yín léèrè (nípa rẹ̀).
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
